segments.text: It sounds that you have a high opinion of him .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He is an all-right guy . I have no bone to pick with him .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But he is not a fine wether friend who could sell you down the river .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You cannot judge a person that way . I have a hunch that he is a sly dog .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Depends on with whom . He may be doing things on the sly , but he is honest with me . I trust him .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can never tell . He might do you in when he sees an angle in doing it .
segments.speaker: S1
